Victoria Memorial The Victoria Memorial is a large marble building, which is considered to be the pride of Kolkata. Built between 1906 and 1921, it is dedicated to the memory of Queen Victoria. Now, it is a museum and a popular tourist spot under the Ministry of Culture. Victoria Memorial Hall, 1, Queens Way, Maidan, Kolkata, West Bengal 700071 10:00â€“18:00. Tuesdays closed. â‚¹20~â‚¹200 Fort William Palace Fort William is a fort built in Kolkata on the eastern banks of the River Hooghly, the major distributary of Ganges, during the early years of the Bengal Presidency in the British India. Maidan, Fort William, Hastings, Kolkata, West Bengal 700021 Mon-Sun : 10:00 A.M â€“ 5:30 P.M Free Howrah Bridge Titled as the â€˜oldest but the busiestâ€™ place in Kolkata, the Howrah Bridge was built over the Hooghly river to ensure connectivity between the two major cities of Kolkata and Howrah. Howrah, West Bengal 700001 Always open Science City Take some time to visit the architectural wonder of the Science City, which is the largest science centre throughout India. Housing a Space Odyssey, Dynamotion, Evolution Park Theme Tour, Maritime Centre, and Earth Exploration Hall, it is one of the best Kolkata tourist places in terms of technology, and architecture. East Topsia, Topsia, Kolkata, West Bengal 700105 Mon-Sun : 09:00 AM - 08:00 PM â‚¹200 033 2285 4343 Belur Math Belur Math is an important pilgrimage site and the headquarters of Ramakrishna Math and Mission. It is one of the best Kolkata tourist places for people who wish to seek inner peace. Belur, Howrah, West Bengal 711202 033 2654 1144 Mon-Sun : 08:30 AM - 06:00 PM Indian Museum The Indian Museum in Kolkata, West Bengal, India, also referred to as the Imperial Museum at Calcutta in colonial-era texts, is the ninth oldest museum of the world, oldest museum in India and the largest museum in India. 27, Jawaharlal Nehru Rd, Dharmatala, Taltala, Kolkata 700016 â‚¹100 033 2252 1790 Tue-Sun : 10:00 AM - 05:00 PM Indian Coffee House It has been for a long time a regular hang out and a renowned meeting place (adda) for intellectuals and students (and ex-students) of the Presidency College, University of Calcutta, and other institutions in College Street. It has played an important part in Calcutta's (Kolkata) cultural history and known as the hub of intellectual debates. Sharda Book Stall, No.15 Near, Bankim Chatterjee St, College Square, Kolkata, West Bengal 700073 â‚¹14~â‚¹110 090077 98519 Mon-Sun : 9:00 AM - 09:00 PM Botanical Gardens The Botanical Gardens are a haven amidst the chaos of Kolkata. Lush and rich with flora, all your eyes can see are shades of green that soothe and relax a tired mind. 1, 2-8-1 Nishi-Shinjuku, Shinjuku-ku, Tokyo +91 3326685357 â‚¹100 Mon-Sun : 08:30 AM - 05:00 PM
Oudh 1590 Traditional Awadhi dishes & cauldron-cooked curries served amid 16th-century period decor. Shop P 562, Hemanata Mukhopadhyay Sarani, Southern Avenue, Kolkata +918961556551 Mon-Sun : 12noon â€“ 3:30pm, 6:30pm â€“ 10:30pm Arsalan Spacious restaurant & catering service for a Mughlai menu & a range of specialty biryanis.. 191, Park Street, Near 7 Point Crossing, Park Circus Area, Kolkata +91 3322844019 Mon-Sun : 10:30am â€“ 12:45am Flurys Open since 1927, this stylish tearoom serves Indian & European cakes/pastries, plus light fare. 18, Park street Area, Kolkata +91 3340007452 Mon-Sun : 7:30am â€“ 11pm Oh! Calcutta Stylish chain dining room for a menu specialising in the unique cooking of Calcutta. 10/3 Elgin Road 4th Floor, Forum Mall, Kolkata 700016 India +91 33 2283 7161 Mon-Sat : 12:30 AM - 3:30 PM ; 7:00 PM - 11:00 PM Haldiram's Prabhuji Indian dishes and a range of special namkeens from a simple chain outlet. P420, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, V.I.P. Road, Kaikhali, Kolkata +91 3340144444 Mon-Sun : 9am â€“ 8:45pm Balaram Mullick & Radharam Mullick Sweets Enduring counter-serve specializing in traditional Indian sweets & baked goods since 1885. 2, Paddapukur Road, Jadubabur Bazar, Bhowanipore, Kolkata 700020 +91 3324222211 Mon-Sun : 10am â€“ 10pm Mainland China Chinese Flavors That Truly Have a 'Different' Tantalizing Effect on Taste Buds. 3A, Uniworth House, Gurusaday Road, Ballygunge, Kolkata +91 6292192008 Mon : 12:45pm â€“ 3:30pm, 7pm â€“ 11pm; Sat-Sun : 12:30pm â€“ 3:30pm, 7pm â€“ 11:30pm
//Hotels Category Strings Hyatt Regency Hyatt Regency Kolkata is a luxury business hotel in Kolkata (or â€œCalcuttaâ€), India. The hotel creates the feel of a private cocoon away from the complexities of modern living without giving up any of its luxuries. Hyatt Regency Kolkata is located next to Salt Lake Stadium & 15 mins drive from IT hub and is a preferred business destination of East India. JA - 1 Sector III Salt Lake City, Kolkata 700098 +91 33 6820 1234 The Westin We are conveniently located in New Town Kolkata, 8 Kms from the Airport. Our 304 well-appointed rooms and suites are one of the largest in the city offering inspiring views of the cityscape. We offer a variety of dining options including 3132, the highest rooftop bar in the city and the award winning Seasonal Tastes. Plot No. CBD/2, Action Area - II, New Town, Rajarhat, Kolkata 585316 033 4037 1234 JW Marriott JW Marriott Hotel Kolkata is located about one kilometre from Science City museum in Kolkata. This modern hotel offers high-tech rooms and world-class amenities including a vast infinity pool and a luxurious spa. 4 A,J.B.S Haldane Avenue, 700105, Kolkata 033 6633 0000 Monotel - Luxury Business Hotel Monotel is a Luxury Business Hotel, Located in the IT Hub of Kolkata. Being an Eco friendly hotel, Monotel is an environmentally conscious hotel that has heralded a new standard of environmental responsibility in the hospitality industry. Sector - V Dm 2 Salt Lake, Kolkata 700091 033 4030 2000 The Pride Hotel Experience the rich cultural tapestry of Calcutta garnished with the modern charm of our 5-star hotel in Kolkata. Pride Plaza Hotel is enclosed within the business hubs of Kolkata city, offering luxury accommodation for corporates and leisure travellers alike. New Town Terminus, B.G-12, Action Area I, 1-B, Newtown, Kolkata 700156 033 4025 9999 The Oberoi Grand Located in Kolkataâ€™s main shopping district, the New Market and business district, The Oberoi Grand Kolkata houses an outdoor pool, gym and spa. 15 Jawaharlal Nehru Road, Kolkata 560001 033 2249 2323 ITC Royal Bengal Situated in Kolkata, 7 km from Indian Museum, ITC Royal Bengal, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Kolkata features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. Featuring a garden, the property is located within 7 km of Nandan. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. 1 JBS Haldane Avenue, Kolkata 700046 033 4446 4646 Taj Bengal Set in landscaped grounds in downtown Kolkata, Taj Bengal offers 5-star luxury with elegant rooms, an outdoor pool and spa. It features a 24-hour gym, free parking and 6 restaurants. 34B, Belvedere Road, Alipore, Kolkata 700027 033 6612 3939

With a quintessential charm that it has retained apart from just the modernization, Kolkata is amongst the four metropolitan cities of India. With a dense heritage, Kolkata is densely populated and is situated at the banks of river Ganga. Being famous for its culture, Kolkata is known for its people, food, music, literature and movies as well.
